TextView.android:text: A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge.Welcome to JIIT's very own BOOK CLUB !!For all those avid book-lovers out there, for all once-a-while readers and for all thosewho wish to but dn't know where to begin. Members can discuss, review , suggest and exchange books with each other.There'll be fun activities like quizes, polls, creativewritings, etc. all year round.
